data:
This tower launches a magical ball that creates a significant impact.
The magic tower has a high range and can inflict great damage from a long distance.
This tower is effective against both ground and aerial enemies.
The magic balls inflict 33% more damage.
The magic tower generates an additional ball, causing more damage.
The magic tower generates an extra ball, causing more damage, both magic balls have a 20% damage increase.
The magic tower generates a ball with 15% more damage, and upon hitting an enemy, it stops them for 1 second, slowing down their progress.
